summary: Frontend testing of ImportUnificato page unification - All requested features verified and working correctly. Page loads without critical errors, all interactive elements functional.

ui_bugs.issue: Duplicate emoji icon displayed ('ðŸ“¥ðŸ“¥ Import Documenti') - label already contains emoji but icon property also renders

action_items: MINOR: Fix duplicate emoji in sidebar - either remove emoji from label 'ðŸ“¥ Import Documenti' or remove icon property from NAV_ITEMS children
critical_code_review_comments: Line 148 in App.jsx: label contains emoji 'ðŸ“¥ Import Documenti' but icon property 'ðŸ“¥' is also set, causing duplicate emoji rendering
context_for_next_testing_agent: ImportUnificato page fully functional. Minor cosmetic issue with duplicate emoji in sidebar.

pagina_import_unificato_carica.details: Page /import-unificato loads correctly with title 'ðŸ“¥ Import Documenti', no critical JavaScript errors

selezione_tipo_documento.details: All 11 document type buttons (Auto-Detect, Fatture XML, Estratto Conto, F24, Quietanza F24, Buste Paga, Bonifici, Corrispettivi, Incassi POS, Versamenti, Fornitori) are clickable and show selected state

toggle_upload_background.details: Background mode toggle (data-testid='background-mode-toggle') works correctly - toggles between checked/unchecked states

opzioni_avanzate_button.details: Clicking 'Opzioni avanzate' button shows/hides ZIP section with 'Carica ZIP Massivo' button (data-testid='upload-zip-btn')

drop_zone_interattiva.details: Drop zone (data-testid='drop-zone') is visible, has cursor:pointer, and hidden file input (data-testid='file-input') exists for click-to-select

legacy_route_redirect.details: Route /import-export correctly shows ImportUnificato component (same page as /import-unificato)

menu_laterale_import_documenti.details: Sidebar shows 'Import Documenti' under Strumenti submenu (link href='/import-unificato'). Old 'Import/Export' text NOT present.

no_critical_js_errors.details: No critical JavaScript errors (TypeError, ReferenceError, SyntaxError). Only minor 404 errors for scadenze API (pre-existing issue from iteration_9)

minor_errors: 404 errors for scadenze API - pre-existing issue, doesn't affect ImportUnificato functionality
